item.title: How to Search for Text in the Microsoft Notepad App (Windows 11)
item.description: This tutorial covers: How to Use Find: With Menu With Keyboard Shortcut How to Use Find Next: With Menu With Click With Keyboard Shortcut How to Use Find Previous: With Menu With Click With Keyboard Shortcut How to Apply Match Case How to Apply Wrap Around How to Clear the Find Bar How to Exit the Find Window: With Click With Keyboard How to Use Find and Replace: With Menu With Click With Keyboard Shortcut No time to scroll down?
